name: Bounce (itch) (TheSunRay)
description:
Thank you for checking the game out! It was created as a part of research for  my Master's thesis, which dissusses the topic of in-game  rewards.  

If you would like to help me with my research please use this link to complete a questionnaire on the topic of in-game rewards and your experience playing the game.

Thanks to
Goboto - https://sites.google.com/site/gobusto/music
Cleyton Kauffman -   https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman
for allowing to use their music.

In case of low fps, please try changing the size of this tab.
If there are any other issues or problems, feel free to leave a comment.
